name: Eduquest
short_description: An mobile application for studying on the move.
long_description: Eduqeust is mobile application for Android which allows its users to quiz themselves for exams and the like. It features a client in the form of an Android application, as well as a backend agnostic approach using a web server for providing the the available categories of questions.
